select emp_no as no, emp_id as id, emp_password as password, emp_photo as photo, emp_name as name, emp_email as email, emp_phone as phone, emp_dept_no as deptNo, emp_position_no as positionNo, emp_deleted as deleted, emp_created_date as createdDate, emp_updated_date as updatedDate, emp_deleted_date as deletedDate from (select row_number() over (order by emp_no desc) row_numbers, emp_no, emp_id, emp_password, emp_photo, emp_name, emp_email, emp_phone, emp_dept_no, emp_position_no, emp_deleted, emp_created_date, emp_updated_date, emp_deleted_date from semi_employees) where row_numbers between #begin# and #end#
